title: Which are the best 18+ Roblox games I can play? - Quora

response.answer_text: If i tell u roblox is designed for kids and teens so there are no games only designed for 18+ but there are some games which are still played alot even by adults!! #1 Blackhawk Rescue Mission blackhawk rescue mission is a high graphic both tps and fps game based on ww2 you have got many options like to drive a car, do an airstrike on the enemy, get ur own guns, night vision access and many more. It is also got various modes like multiplayer, 5v5 and open world too.It’s difficulty level also matches the age of adults. it is also free with no robux to pay. Available platforms PC, Conslole

I don’t think that there are any much 18+ games on Roblox. Well, there were “Scented Cons” there which were basically games on Roblox which people did inappropriate things on, however those got taken down on Roblox because it violated their terms of service. Roblox is a game that designed to be for ages 8–18 so there shouldn’t be any “18+” games on Roblox at all! I hope this helps!
